DOC.criteria: Patient ICD implant previous year document spontaneous lifethreatening ventricular arrhythmia OR implant ICD least one appropriate ICD therapy ( shock antitachycardia pace ) ventricular tachycardia ventricular fibrillation previous year . Left ventricular ejection fraction measure 2Dechocardiography must document less 40 % last 6 month .
